ygData.subject: the bayle list..
ygData.msgSnippet: ok xillith, this is important, since you said that the bayle list quest seemed to be broken on your side :) now, were you trying to return the bayle list to
ygData.messageBody:
ok xillith, this is important, since you said that the bayle list quest
seemed to be broken on your side :) now, were you trying to return the bayle
list to the npc in QEYNOS, or the npc in FREEPORT? :) i intend to turn the
list in to the freeport npc, but since you said it was broken and i dont
know which, i'm too scared to try! hehe.. it took too much time and too much
luck to get as far as i am now to throw it away on a roadblock..

my take on arlena is that, since there is no arlena npc, maybe one of the
nasty undead things in mistmoore is "arlena"? or maybe arlena died at some
point, and some other npc picked up her remains. this is another good reason
to raise faction in mistmoore, so we can go there and talk to npcs and see
if any of them know anything about arlena.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
